attributes.comment:
I am writing in reference to the proposed fee increase on submission of the I600A
adoption petition for . An International adoption is an expensive endeavor, but one
that is more than worthwhile for both a child and the adoptive family. However, due
to the extensive time it may take to get a child into the United States it's possible
that the approval for the adoption petition, the 171H, may expire and an adoptive
family may have to resubmit for a 2nd 171H. The fee for the 171H is already fairly
high and doubling it would really make it a substantial cost of the adoption.
Please reconsider the fee increase.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Margaret Cossman
